relation: configure terminal Example: Device# configure terminal
interface atm number Example: Device(config)# interface ATM 0/0/0.1
ip pim sparse-mode Example: Device(config-if)# ip pim sparse-mode
Enables privileged EXEC mode. Enter your password if prompted.
pageTitle: IP Multicast: Multicast Legacy Technologies, Configuration Guide, Cisco IOS XE Release 3S (Cisco ASR 1000) - Configuring IP Multicast over ATM [Support] - Cisco
textBeforeTable: DETAILED STEPS 5.   end 4.    ip pim sparse-mode 3.    interface atm number 2.    configure terminal 1.    enable SUMMARY STEPS The ATM bundle must be configured on each device. IP multicast routing must be configured. Before You Begin Perform this task to configure IP multicast on each ATM interface in the ATM bundle. The following task is for configuring PIM sparse mode on the ATM bundle. However, this feature is supported with PIM sparse mode, PIM dense mode, and PIM sparse-dense mode. Note Configuring IP Multicast over ATM PVC Bundle
textAfterTable: Configuration Examples for IP Multicast over ATM Example: IP Multicast over ATM Point-to-Multipoint VCs Example: IP Multicast over ATM PVC Bundle Example: IP Multicast over ATM VC Example: IP Multicast over ATM Point-to-Multipoint VCs The following example shows how to enable IP multicast over ATM point-to-multipoint VCs:  interface ATM2/0 ip address 171.69.214.43 255.255.255.248 ip pim sparse-mode ip pim multipoint-signalling ip ospf network broadcast atm nsap-address 47.00918100000000410B0A1981.333333333333.00 atm pvc 1 0 5 qsaal atm pvc 2 0 16 ilmi atm multipoint-signalling map-group mpvc router ospf 9 network 171.69.214.0 0.0.0.255 area 0 ! ip classless ip pim rp-address 171.69.10.13 98 ! map-list mpvc ip 171.69.214.41 atm-nsap 47.00918100000000410B0A1981.111111111111.00 broadcast ip 171.69.214.42 atm-nsap 47.00918100000000410B0A1981.222222222222.00 broadcast ip 171.69.214.43 atm-nsap 47.00918100000000410B0A1981.333333333333.00 broadcast Example: IP Multicast over ATM PVC Bundle The following examples show how to configure IP multicast over ATM PVC bundle for the following topology: multicast sender --> Device1 -- ATM bundle -- Device2 --> multicast receiver Configure ATM bundle on
